One piece combines Soothing Freshwater Pearl, Mystical Moonstone and Amplifying Clear Quartz with White/Creme accent seed beads. This delicate piece is combined with another piece that features Powerful and Protective Amethyst, Moonstone and even more Pearls with Violet seed beads. These Belly Beads are worn in the waist/hip area to adorn the body and to provide healing and protection for mother and growing child within. The healing properties of the stones/crystals in these pieces are:

Moonstone: Moonstone enhances intuition, promotes inspiration, success and good fortune in love and business matters. A stone for “new beginnings”, Moonstone is a stone of inner growth and strength. It soothes emotional instability and stress, and stabilises the emotions, providing calmness. 

Amethyst: Amethyst is a powerful and protective stone. It guards against psychic attack, transmuting the energy into love and protecting the wearer from all types of harm, including geopathic or electromagnetic stress and ill wishes from others. Amethyst is a natural tranquiliser, it relieves stress and strain, soothes irritability, balances mood swings, dispels anger, rage, fear and anxiety.

Freshwater Pearl: Pearl increases fertility and can help eases childbirth. This soothing stone is a great stress reliever and pacifier.

Clear Quartz: Quartz enhances energy by absorbing, storing, amplifying, balancing, focusing and transmitting. Makes other stones work more effectively when paired with them. 

Waist beads have also been traditionally used as a means to Tone Abdomen muscles that are very important in supporting a healthy pregnancy and delivery.
